title: Handle Out-of-Gauge (OOG) Cargo
description: A large piece of machinery that doesn't fit in a standard container (OOG) needs to be loaded onto a vessel.

tasks.description: Review the OOG cargo's dimensions, weight, and lifting point diagram.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner has all the specifications for the oversized cargo.

tasks.description: Create a special lifting plan, including the use of a spreader frame or special slings for the crane.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed, step-by-step lifting plan is engineered and approved.

tasks.description: Assign a specialized stevedoring gang and crane operator to perform the lift under the supervision of a foreman.
tasks.expected_outcome: The work is assigned to a crew experienced with heavy and oversized lifts.
